text: Hip贸lito Reyes Larios (13 August 1946 - 8 August 2021) was a Mexican Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Veracruz, Mexico. He was made a priest in 1973. Reyes Larios was Bishop of Orizaba from 2000 until 2007 and Archbishop of Xalapa from 2007 until his death. Reyes Larios died on 8 August 2021 in Xalapa, Mexico from a gastrointestinal hemorrhage, five days before his 75th birthday.Muri贸 arzobispo Hip贸lito Reyes Larios en Xalapa, Veracruz ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops Category:People from Veracruz Category:Deaths from gastrointestinal hemorrhage
